title: Being Love Exclusively by You - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Music   Naive Protagonist   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Singers   Twisted Personality
author: Qian Cao   千草
description:
She is foolish enough, stupid enough, idiotic enough. 

Whatever it takes, it makes him want to possess and capture the attention of “her music”. 

To the extent that he couldn’t ignore her anymore as if she is air. 

Wanting to get closer to her, wanting to take all of her, but damn, she is afraid and trembles at him. 

He doesn’t want to wait anymore “for the lyric”, and at her side he feels so restless. 

But this absent-minded girl, unexpectedly being so foolish, asked him–why I am so special?>
